notes: Third generation F56 LCI (Life Cycle Impulse) facelift with updated styling and tech. BMW B38 3-cylinder turbo with TwinPower Turbo. 7-speed DCT requires specialized transmission diagnostics. Data sourced from Wikipedia Mini Hatch article, January 2025 revision.

Third generation F56 LCI Cooper S facelift with BMW B48 2.0L turbo. Updated interior tech including touchscreen infotainment. DCT transmission requires specialized service procedures. Data sourced from Wikipedia Mini Hatch article, January 2025 revision.

Third generation F57 LCI facelift convertible with power soft top. Available in Cooper and Cooper S variants with BMW B-series engines. Power top mechanism requires specialized diagnostic tools. Data sourced from Wikipedia Mini Convertible article, January 2025 revision.

Second generation F54 LCI Clubman facelift with updated styling. Optional ALL4 AWD with electromagnetic multi-plate clutch. 8-speed automatic transmission. Discontinued after 2023 model year in North America. Data sourced from Wikipedia Mini Clubman article, January 2025 revision.

Second generation F60 LCI Countryman facelift with updated styling and tech. Optional ALL4 AWD system. Available with BMW B-series 3-cylinder and 4-cylinder turbo engines. Data sourced from Wikipedia Mini Countryman article, January 2025 revision.

First fully electric Mini with 32.6 kWh lithium-ion battery pack. 181 hp electric motor, 110 miles EPA range. High-voltage system (400V) requires EV-certified technicians for service. Based on F56 platform. Data sourced from Wikipedia Mini Electric article, January 2025 revision.

Fourth generation all-electric Cooper on new U25 platform. Available with 40.7 kWh or 54.2 kWh battery pack. High-voltage system requires EV-certified technicians. Completely redesigned with circular OLED touchscreen. Data sourced from Wikipedia Mini Electric article, January 2025 revision.

Fourth generation U25 Cooper with completely redesigned styling. Available in Cooper C and Cooper S variants with updated BMW B-series engines. 7-speed DCT transmission. Circular OLED touchscreen infotainment. Data sourced from Wikipedia Mini Hatch article, January 2025 revision.

engines: 1.5L B38 + electric motor PHEV (241 hp combined)
notes: Third generation U25 Countryman significantly redesigned on new platform. Available in Cooper C, Cooper S, and John Cooper Works variants. Plug-in hybrid (PHEV) variant features 1.5L engine with electric motor, 14.2 kWh battery. PHEV requires high-voltage system expertise. Data sourced from Wikipedia Mini Countryman article, January 2025 revision.
